hospital: Krung Siam St. Carlos Medical Centre

footer.history_desc: Krung Siam St. Carlos Medical Centre offers a team of reputable doctors, specialists and consultants from the Faculty of Medicine at Thammasat University, as well as several government hospitals.Its experienced medical personnel are always on call 24 hours a day.
footer.address: 5/84 Moo 2 Tiwanon Road, Banklang, Amphur Muang, Phathumthani 12000

icon_btn.BNSDC: Brain and Nervous System Disorders Center

history.1: 1987 St. Carlos group first began as “Suthipron Clinic” in Bangkok for both inpatient and weight loss patients.
history.2: 1988 “Pahdipat Poly Clinic” was established in Bangkok for both inpatient and weight loss consultation.
history.3: 1989 “Sutjarit Poly Clinic” was established in Bangkok for both inpatient and weight loss consultation.
history.4: 1993 Bangkok Mediclub Center was established in Bangkok.
history.5: 1995 Krungsiam Medical Center & Medical Spa were established and located in the suburbs of Bangkok,Phatumtanee.
history.6: 1997 St. Carlos Laboratory Co., Ltd was established for science research and production of products for both local and international markets.
history.7: 1998 St Carlos Phama International Company was established in Philippines as weight loss production center for distribution worldwide.

AboutUs.head: About Us
AboutUs.text-1: Built in 1994, the Krung Siam St. Carlos Medical Centre has developed into one of the largest medical centers in Thailand with a fully equipped state-of-the-art medical facilities located in the suburbs of Bangkok. It houses Asia’s first integrated medical spa, health center, and the head office of the St. Carlos Group of Health Services. The Centre is a modern private 10-storey hospital with 100 beds and a convenient car park for up to 200 cars. It is located on 14,000 square meters of land on Tiwanon Road, Banklang, Amper Muang, Pathumthani province just 27 kilometers from Bangkok. There is easy access to the vibrant city center. The new Future Park, the largest shopping centerand entertainment complex in Asia, is seven kilometers away. Nearby are the famous tourist attractions of the Bang Pa-In Summer Palace and the ancient city of Ayutthaya. The hospital provides health services and information to the local communities.
